Headline: #39 Pershing Temporary Westbound Reroute near 39th/Kedzie
ShortDescription: REVISED: WB 39 Pershing buses are temporarily rerouted via 39th, California, 38th, Kedzie, and 39th due to, street blockage near 39th/Kedzie.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
REVISED: Westbound #39 Pershing buses are temporarily rerouted via 39th, California, 38th, Kedzie, and 39th due to, street blockage near 39th/Kedzie.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier police activity at Fullerton. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier police activity at Fullerton.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored. Allow extra travel time.
